mapper.select: SELECT car_num FROM car_board WHERE car_num=#{car_num}
SELECT * FROM car_board WHERE car_name like '%'||#{search_obj} or car_name like #{search_obj}||'%' or car_name like '%'||#{search_obj}||'%'
SELECT * FROM car_board WHERE car_num like '%'||#{search_obj} or car_num like #{search_obj}||'%' or car_num like '%'||#{search_obj}||'%'
SELECT * FROM car_board WHERE brand like '%'||#{search_obj} or brand like #{search_obj}||'%' or brand like '%'||#{search_obj}||'%'
SELECT * FROM car_board WHERE fuel_type like '%'||#{search_obj} or fuel_type like #{search_obj}||'%' or fuel_type like '%'||#{search_obj}||'%'
SELECT * FROM car_board WHERE driven>=100000 and 250000>driven
SELECT * FROM car_board order by reg_date desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car_board (car_name, car_num, driven, fuel_type, fuel_gage, zone_num, fee_hour, fee_km, car_image, brand, car_size, reg_date) VALUES(#{car_name},#{car_num},#{driven},#{fuel_type},#{fuel_gage},#{zone_num},#{fee_hour},#{fee_km},#{car_image},#{brand},#{car_size},#{reg_date})
